last_episode_to_air.name: Eat Your Heart Out
last_episode_to_air.overview: Trey Songz joins Team Martha and Tamar Braxton joins Team Snoop in the kitchen to see which team can cook up the hottest Valentine's Day dinner and take home the potluck party platter.

name: Martha & Snoop's Potluck Dinner Party
overview: The Queen of Cuisine and the King of Kush are coming together to invite their celebrity friends over for a little potluck fun. Games, recipes and musical guests. It's guaranteed to have everyone buzzing.

episodes.name: Putting The Pot In Potluck
episodes.overview: Seth Rogen, Ice Cube & Wiz Khalifa join Martha and Snoop as they put their secret fried chicken recipes to the test and go head to head in an epic cock fight. Anderson .Paak adds a little ‘Come Down’ to the throw-down.

episodes.name: Keep Your Claws Off Me
episodes.overview: Ashley Graham and Rick Ross help Martha and Snoop tackle lobster two ways. Things get steamy when Rick wants to heat it up with Martha in more ways than one.

episodes.name: Ruffling Feathers
episodes.overview: Naya Rivera, 2Chainz and Chris Bosh stop by to help Snoop and Martha cook Thanksgiving dinner. For dessert, the kitchen full of celebrities enjoys a special live performance from Dreezy.

episodes.name: Bringing Home The Bacon
episodes.overview: Robin Thicke, Keke Palmer and DJ Khaled join Snoop and Martha for everyone's favorite meal - breakfast for dinner. Martha introduces her famous popovers and Snoop educates the group on the true art of makin' bacon.

episodes.name: Deck The Balls
episodes.overview: Jason Derulo and Jamie Chung ring in the holidays with Martha and Snoop as they help cook up Snoop’s Christmas catfish, concoct a potent blend of eggnog and salivate over Martha’s crunchy dessert balls. The halls have never been decked quite like this.

episodes.name: Something Fishy
episodes.overview: Martha & Snoop take their rolling skills to the next level making sushi with special guests Kathy Griffin, Mike Epps, and sushi chefs Abe Hiroki & Morimoto. D.R.A.M. performs his hit single ‘Broccoli’.

episodes.name: They Got Game
episodes.overview: Huddle up! Martha & Snoop are making some game day favorites with special guest the Trap Kitchen chefs and youth players from Snoop’s Youth Football League and team – the Pomona Steelers.

episodes.name: High On The Hog
episodes.overview: Martha & Snoop get things good and smoky when they roast a whole hog with special guests Fat Joe, Kelis and Remy Ma.

episodes.name: Keepin’ It In The Family
episodes.overview: Everyone knows there’s nothing better than home cooking, so Martha and Snoop invite special guests Ashlee Simpson, Evan Ross and Snoop’s Uncle Reo to whip up some of their family favorites and share some family secrets.

episodes.name: Makin’ That Dough
episodes.overview: Martha & Snoop throw the ultimate pizza party with special guests Curtis “50 Cent” Jackson, Bella Thorne and musical guest October London.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday Snoop!
episodes.overview: It’s a new season and Jamie Foxx, Patti LaBelle and Charlie Wilson join Martha and Snoop for a very special occasion… Snoop’s birthday! There is singing, helium and even a hilarious serenade from Martha. It’s a birthday Snoop will never forget.

episodes.name: Tricks and Treats
episodes.overview: Tichina Arnold and Ross Matthews join Snoop and Martha for a spooky meal of shrimp brains, eye eggs and a scrumptious cadaver. But things get really scary when Snoop and Martha go head to head in an epic rap battle.

episodes.name: Keepin’ It Crunk
episodes.overview: Diddy, Usher and La La Anthony show up to help Martha and Snoop get crunk because they’re cooking with booze. But when the booze goes to their head things get lit and lit.

episodes.name: Let's Get Roasted
episodes.overview: LL Cool J and Kate Upton join Martha and Snoop to remix an old school classic. But when insult comic Jeff Ross shows up, Snoop goes from being baked to being roasted.

episodes.name: We've Got Sole
episodes.overview: Wendy Williams and Post Malone help Snoop and Martha take it 420,000 leagues under the sea, cooking up Tuna Tar Tar and Baked Doggfather of Sole. It gets a little too fishy when an audience member drinks an all fish smoothie mixed up by Chef Snoop!

episodes.name: Bon Appetizzle
episodes.overview: Wilmer Valderrama and Tamar Braxton accompany Snoop and Martha to Europe for some French delicacies, including a $500 macaroon. Thanks to a dance lesson from Wilmer, Snoop and Martha get close and take their relationship to another level.

episodes.name: Getting Some Tongue
episodes.overview: Martha and Snoop and their dinner guests, Kelly Rowland and George Lopez, turn Taco Tuesday into Taco Tongueday. Later, somebody has to eat the worm at the bottom of the tequila bottle.

episodes.name: Joy To The Wizorld!
episodes.overview: Kelly and Sharon Osbourne and Rae Sremmurd join Martha and Snoop for a ho, ho, holiday blowout complete with our second annual celebrity sing-along, and an 8-foot booze luge.

episodes.name: What’s Your Beef?
episodes.overview: RuPaul and Faith Evans got beef with Martha and Snoop—actually, a whole slab of it. And later, Martha and Snoop unveil the most expensive burger in the world…the Douche Burger.

episodes.name: Gettin’ Veggie With It
episodes.overview: Martha enlists Michelle Rodriguez and Cedric The Entertainer to help her convert Snoop into a vegetarian. Later, Snoop uses his own ‘greens’ to bake Martha something very special.

episodes.name: Shell of a Good Time
episodes.overview: Anthony Anderson and Christina Milian join Snoop and Martha for a tutorial on crab… asses. And later, Anthony has a few too many and talks about the time his mama caught him in the act.

episodes.name: Grilled Muncheese
episodes.overview: Lil Rel and Kat Graham stop by to help Martha and Snoop grill up an American classic with an IRON! It’s all ooey-gooey fun and Lil Rel even shows us why he’s the world’s best arm dancer.

episodes.name: Return of the Mac N Cheese
episodes.overview: Terrence Howard, Queen Latifah and Jussie Smollett help Martha teach Snoop how to milk a cow. Talk about making Mac N Cheese from scratch!

episodes.name: Wok This Way
episodes.overview: Margaret Cho and G-Eazy follow Martha and Snoop to the Far East. G-Eazy tries his best pick-up line on Martha & we learn a secret recipe from the famous Mr. Chow restaurant!

episodes.name: In the Mood
episodes.overview: Craig Robinson and Jeannie Mai get steamy with Snoop and Martha as they dish on their celebrity fantasies. And later, Craig and Snoop serenade the audience with a song that will have everyone undressing.

episodes.name: Pasta La Vista, Baby!
episodes.overview: Martha and Snoop convince Wendi McLendon-Covey and Steve Aoki to reveal their most embarrassing memories all while chowing down on delicious pasta. And one lucky fan wins the chance to take the greatest selfie ever!

episodes.name: Let's Bayou Dinner
episodes.overview: Ty Dolla $ign, Wanda Sykes and Lance Bass cook up some po’ boys and grits with Martha and Snoop New Orleans Style! And later, find out what weirdest fan gifts our celebrities have ever received!

episodes.name: Taj Ma-Holler
episodes.overview: Martha invites Laverne Cox, Gary Owen and Lil Yachty into the kitchen to help Snoop face one of his biggest fears. And later, Lil Yachty sings his hit, Better.

episodes.name: Stackin' My Bread
episodes.overview: T-Pain and Karrueche Tran learn how a sausage is really made. Plus, T-Pain teaches Martha how to autotune her recipe.

episodes.name: Spicing It Up
episodes.overview: Don Cheadle, Sherri Shepherd and Chilli from TLC sweat it out with Snoop and Martha in an extreme hot chili-eating contest. And later, rap sensation KYLE shows up to sing his hit, iSPY.

episodes.name: 4/20 The Munchie Snackdown
episodes.overview: Matthew McConaughey joins Team Martha and Method Man joins Team Snoop to see who can make the greenest and the meanest munchies; Isla Fisher gets blunt as guest judge and decides which team wins.

episodes.name: Mother of All Brunches
episodes.overview: Octavia Spencer joins Team Martha and Fergie joins Team Snoop to see who has the best Mother’s Day brunch skills for the mother of all food fights! Guest judges Toya Wright and Rumer Willis decide which team will take home the Potluck Party Platter.

episodes.name: Best Friend-ly Competition
episodes.overview: Tiffany Haddish joins Team Martha and Meghan Trainor joins Team Snoop to see who can make the best "odd couple" dish for Best Friends Day, and Kandi Burruss guest judges.

episodes.name: Father's Day Feast
episodes.overview: Regina Hall joins Team Snoop, and Rev Run joins Team Martha, to see who can make the boldest Father’s Day feast! Guest judge Jessie T. Usher decides which team will take home the Potluck Party Platter.

episodes.name: BBQ Battle
episodes.overview: The Jonas Brothers go on a Summertime cook-off with Martha and Snoop.

episodes.name: Halloween Food Fight
episodes.overview: Lil Pump and Eve joins the spooky kitchen showdown. Also features guest judge Tami Roman.

episodes.name: Friendsgiving Face-Off
episodes.overview: Yvonne Orji joins Team Martha and Jimmy Kimmel joins Team Snoop for a Friendsgiving food fight. Guest judge Guillermo will determine which of these friends take home the Potluck Party Platter.

episodes.name: Holiday Frost Fight
episodes.overview: Tank joins Team Martha, and Paris Hilton joins Team Snoop in the kitchen to see which team is colder in the kitchen for a Holiday Frost Fight. Guest judge, Haha Davis steps in to determine which of these friends take home the prize.

episodes.name: Championship Chow Down
episodes.overview: Michael Strahan and Michael Rapaport help Martha and Snoop get game day ready with an epic chicken wing cook-off, and Jesse Palmer and Laurie Hernandez serve as guest judges

episodes.name: Eat Your Heart Out
episodes.overview: Trey Songz joins Team Martha and Tamar Braxton joins Team Snoop in the kitchen to see which team can cook up the hottest Valentine's Day dinner and take home the potluck party platter.
